casebody.data:
Edward Maher and Charles C. Gilbert v. The Gunthorpe-Warren Printing Co.Appeal from the Circuit Court of Cook County.Affirmed on authority of Redlich v. Bauerlee, 98 Ill. 137, and Chisholm v. The Beaman M. Co., 160 Ill. 101.Maher & Gilbert and Robert F. Kolb, attorneys for appellants.Clark & Clark, attorneys for appellee.

The only question of law involved in this appeal was one of admissibility in evidence of books of account.
